title: I think Annie has been around Garen to much lately.

replies.body:
{{champion:1}} It's like I'm his cute little sister!
{{champion:99}} _Death stare_
You know Lux would happily welcome a new member to her family. Don't deny it. :P

She can teach her how to be a creepy stalker 
https://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2566/9945/original.jpg

{{champion:55}} And I'll be like his sister that he commits incest with!
{{champion:99}} *Double Demacia Lazor stare*

{{champion:1}} "When I grow up I want to be just like Gawen!"

Then Annie grows up to be a large female flaming juggernaut who spins to set aflame to all she touches.

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=w49HWvGt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-18T14:07:43.584+0000)

> 
> Then Annie grows up to be a large female flaming juggernaut who spins to set aflame to all she touches.

*Cough* next annie rework *Cough*
*Cough* too soon *cough*
Annie is growing up?

> [{quoted}](name=HadestheHandsome,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=w49HWvGt,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-18T15:17:11.353+0000)
>
> Annie is growing up?

Unless shes cursed with immortal youth or shes a yordle and just looks really young..
Shes technically 16? maybe older idk
she's a human 6-year-old as far as canon goes
For almost 10 years now, right?

> [{quoted}](name=HadestheHandsome,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=w49HWvGt,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-18T15:44:38.584+0000)
>
> For almost 10 years now, right?

You do know if a game or show of any kind completely ignores 'things like time progression and development', then plenty of magically always the same age schmicks happen. 

I mean look at Pokemon, they basically had Satoshi/Ash be the main protagonist the whole time, when originally he started his journey in season 1 at the age of 10. If you consider all the retarded shenigans he's been thru, you'd think he would of already aged 5 years or even more, missed plenty of 'mandatory' school education, plus could likely be the only reason why it could be logically explained he is pulling mistakes like he gets amnesia after every episode, even back in the original seasons. Likely should of caught way more pokemon then he should already be at, use his entire roster of pokemon instead of dropping them all sides the mascot mouse, somehow loses pretty much every 'pokemon league he enters' because plot fk'ery, even his 'mascot mouse' should already be some powerhouse capped out monster yet loses to a starter that may of just been with a new trainer for less then a few days, yet he can blow up stronger pokemon with ease.

Anyone remember how basically in the first set of episodes that electric rodent basically used "Thunder" [Stormy weather aside] (one of the best original electric moves) and nuked a swarm of spearow and a fearow? Weakness or not, you'd have to be pretty overpowered to pull that off when your basically a 'starter'.

Enough of that rant though, i would agree Annie is not only in the 'old kind of champion spot', even if they gave tibbers a enrage effect. She's still in a good position to get a champion tune up to make her into something a little more useful and throw in a 'appearance progression' update like how Tarlic had his lore progress from his previous one into the version it is now, giving him a less of some silly crystal knight look and more of a 'gem power battle mage look.'

Wouldn't have to be serious if they ever decided to progress on it, add maybe a few years to make her look more like a middle schooler maybe, keep some of her charms of what makes her, her (because she ain't Annie without Tibbers~ ^^). But obviously don't turn her into some gothic trope, plenty of 'characters' end up with those silly schmicks. Course now im just reminded on how Ahri could also use a retooling of her kit and style since lore'wise she's just a fox who has life stealing powers where unless Annie has some crazy lore, i would assume she's just a little innocent but can basically seem like a demented little girl to others with pyro'kinesis powers.

or this one ->

If "The Simpsons'"characters had aged in real time, Homer would be 62 years old, Marge 61, Bart 36, Lisa 34, Maggie 26, and Santa’s Little Helper would be 196 in dog years.
Sheesh, Ekko, quit ulting.

Ash trained Pikachu through 13 seasons (that's 653 episodes).  Under Ash's guidance, Pikachu has been able to defeat even _legendary_ pokémon.  And then Pikachu gets beat up by a level five Snivy.  {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

http://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/aKBDBZg_700b.jpg

actually some one did the math on that ash would be around 17-18 because his world does age slower than ours plus when he first started his journey it took him the longest on routes since it was his first time but as he went to new regions it didnt take as long this is also including canon shenanigans so since hes in the kalos region and going by the pokemons slower time (compared to ours) if ash was allowed to age normaly he would be about 19 (other number was before he hit kalos) so in retrospect ash would be a young adult if he was allowed to age this would also go for serena since shes ash's childhood friend 
Jessy and james would be 24 (kalos region)(and their age in the show and comic is 15 yeah i was surprised to)
Misty would be 21
Brock 22-23 (since i cant rember if he was 13 or 14)
just to give you something to think about.
Pretty sure riot won't ever age annie, just because "kid" is a part of her character identity and they won't want to remove that.
Maybe she finally learnt ash's secret

she's like Ash
prema 10 years old. But she might get a new hat
we need at least 1 loli for league
